name: 洪輝嵩
objective:
此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、壓力及溫度在纖維材料上之理論與應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, and composite fabricated methods; use of printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.
schedule:
1. 紡織產業介紹：第 1-3 週
2. 纖維材料加工 (含結晶、順向、延伸及張力)：第 4-8 週
3. 抽絲及加工絲工程：第 9-12 週
4. 織布及染整：第 13-15 週
5. 期末報告：第 16-18 週
scorePolicy: 期末上台報告及詳細書面報告各佔 50%
